title: Vikingr
description: IN A VIKING EXPEDITION, THERE ARE ONLY HEROES AND THE DEAD. As it plunges into the 10th Century, Eastern Europe is in turmoil. Warlike peoples and strange cultures collide as they migrate across the sweeping plains, winding rivers and shadowed forests of the Kievan Rus’. A lone Norse longboat sails into these dark, perilous lands in a quest for exploration, trade and plunder. Aboard this ship is Erikr, a young man on his first overseas expedition. Erikr's crew is torn apart by violence and betrayal. He must either become a vikingr, a Norse seafaring warrior, or watch everyone he cares for die on the end of a sword. A ferocious killer stalks his companions, murdering them in the darkness and leaving horrific clues behind. In the East, death awaits…
author: J.S. Malpas
